title: Subpart 635-7 - Environmental Requirements
content:
Subpart 635-7 - Environmental Requirements

State Regulations
§ 635-7.1 - Building codes (see glossary) and occupancy classifications for all facilities other than family care homes (see glossary)
§ 635-7.2 - Life Safety Code requirements
§ 635-7.3 - Safety and welfare requirements for all facilities (except for family care homes and individualized residential alternatives [IRAs] housing eight or fewer persons)
§ 635-7.4 - Family care homes and individualized residential alternatives (IRAs) for eight or fewer persons
§ 635-7.5 - Physical plant, environmental and certification requirements for site based day habilitation and for site based prevocational services sites established on and after September 1, 2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
